SYN_BRONCH_2_7:
[Indication]
Diagnosis and staging of RLL pulmonary nodule.

[Anesthesia]
General, 8.5 ETT.

[Description]
1. Diagnostic Bronchoscopy: Normal airways.
2. Navigation: SuperDimension to RLL superior segment.
3. Confirmation: Radial EBUS (concentric).
4. Sampling: Transbronchial needle and forceps biopsies. ROSE: Malignancy.
5. EBUS Staging: Stations 4L, 7, 4R sampled via TBNA.
6. Hemostasis: Iced saline used for oozing at 4R.

[Plan]
Repeat CXR tomorrow. Await pathology.
